name: Sea To Summit Alpha Pan
description: Impress your camp-mates with a gourmet grilled cheese or a spicy stir-fry. The hard-anodized aluminum is uber-durable so you'll be flipping flapjacks on it for many adventures. Since the non-stick coating disperses heat evenly, you're less likely to burn your meal too.Lightweight hard-anodized aluminum is simple to clean.Non-stick coating is abrasion-resistant and distributes heat for even cooking.Flip-up handle has silicone grip for easy handling and folds underneath pan for transport.Textured base keeps pot secure on camp stoves.Nests with Sea to Summit Alpha pots.
